title: Ep. 17 - NoSQL Injection: WAF Evasion Fundamentals
subtitle: How do attackers circumvent WAF rules?
description-meta: Learn How Attackers Circumvent WAF Rules Through Simple Reconissance
description-html:
1. Exercise: Evaluate WAF attack vectors by looking at a Modsecurity WAF Rule
  2. Exercise: Deduce backend logic through URL structure to bypass potential WAF rules and dump all documents within a MongoDb collection
  3. Extension of NoSqi Series
    • https://sts.tools/nosql
tags: NoSQLi,noSQL Injection,AppSec,Application Security,OWASP TOP TEN,OWASP TOP 10,WAF Evasion,WAF,Modsecurity,MongoDb
social-intro: Hey guys! Another week... another tutorial :D Join me to learn how attackers evade Firewalls by doing simple api reconnisance
